title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, August 31, 2020
description: It's the birthday of pioneering educator Maria Montessori (1870-1952), who emphasized independence, self-directed learning, and learning from peers.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of pioneering educator Maria Montessori (1870-1952), who emphasized independence, self-directed learning, and learning from peers.
